nodes.text: The Muntuur system was a star system that was located within the Sloo sector, a part of the galactic regions known as the Mid Rim and the Slice. It was the origin point of the Muntuur stones, a well-known grouping of seven stones each weighing at least five metric tons.
The Muntuur system was established in the StarWars.com Online Companion to the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, which placed the system in grid square P-14.
